snippet: The pressure is now on Leicester City's title rivals to remove the Foxes from the top of the Premier League table, manager Claudio Ranieri said after Saturday's thumping 3-1 league victory over Manchester City....

headline.main: Pressure Now on Title Rivals, Says Leicester's Ranieri
headline.print_headline: Pressure Now on Title Rivals, Says Leicester's Ranieri

lead_paragraph: The pressure is now on Leicester City's title rivals to remove the Foxes from the top of the Premier League table, manager Claudio Ranieri said after Saturday's thumping 3-1 league victory over Manchester City.

snippet: Defenders James Tomkins and James Collins will miss West Ham United's next few games with a calf and hamstring injury respectively, manager Slaven Bilic said ahead of Saturday's Premier League trip to Everton....

headline.main: West Ham's Collins and Tomkins Out With Injury
headline.print_headline: West Ham's Collins and Tomkins Out With Injury

lead_paragraph: Defenders James Tomkins and James Collins will miss West Ham United's next few games with a calf and hamstring injury respectively, manager Slaven Bilic said ahead of Saturday's Premier League trip to Everton.

snippet: Manchester City could be without playmaker David Silva for Saturday's home game against Bournemouth while midfielder Ilkay Guendogan may make his Premier League debut....

headline.main: Silva May Miss Out for Man City but Guendogan Set to Play
headline.print_headline: Silva May Miss Out for Man City but Guendogan Set to Play

lead_paragraph: Manchester City could be without playmaker David Silva for Saturday's home game against Bournemouth while midfielder Ilkay Guendogan may make his Premier League debut.

snippet: Leicester City's over-achieving players will be sold if they lose their focus and slide down the table in the second half of the Premier League season, manager Claudio Ranieri said....

headline.main: Focus or You're Out, Ranieri Tells Leicester Players
headline.print_headline: Focus or You're Out, Ranieri Tells Leicester Players

lead_paragraph: Leicester City's over-achieving players will be sold if they lose their focus and slide down the table in the second half of the Premier League season, manager Claudio Ranieri said.

snippet: David Moyes has questioned his former club Manchester United's transfer policy as he prepares Sunderland for Monday's Premier League clash at Old Trafford....

headline.main: United Have Moved Away From Traditions on Transfers, Says Moyes
headline.print_headline: United Have Moved Away From Traditions on Transfers, Says Moyes

lead_paragraph: David Moyes has questioned his former club Manchester United's transfer policy as he prepares Sunderland for Monday's Premier League clash at Old Trafford.

snippet: Manchester United manager Jose Mourinho will be a "massive improvement" on predecessor Louis van Gaal, according to former Old Trafford boss Alex Ferguson....

headline.main: Mourinho Will Be Massive Improvement at United-Ferguson
headline.print_headline: Mourinho Will Be Massive Improvement at United-Ferguson

lead_paragraph: Manchester United manager Jose Mourinho will be a "massive improvement" on predecessor Louis van Gaal, according to former Old Trafford boss Alex Ferguson.

snippet: Midfielder Moussa Sissoko will miss Tottenham Hotspur's Champions League game against Russian side CSKA Moscow on Tuesday, manager Mauricio Pochettino said....

headline.main: Sissoko Among Five Spurs Players to Miss CSKA Game
headline.print_headline: Sissoko Among Five Spurs Players to Miss CSKA Game

lead_paragraph: Midfielder Moussa Sissoko will miss Tottenham Hotspur's Champions League game against Russian side CSKA Moscow on Tuesday, manager Mauricio Pochettino said.

snippet: Leicester City goalkeeper Kasper Schmeichel has signed a five-year contract with the Premier League champions that will keep him at the club until 2021....

headline.main: Schmeichel Agrees Five-Year Deal at Leicester
headline.print_headline: Schmeichel Agrees Five-Year Deal at Leicester

lead_paragraph: Leicester City goalkeeper Kasper Schmeichel has signed a five-year contract with the Premier League champions that will keep him at the club until 2021.

snippet: Crystal Palace striker Dwight Gayle has agreed a new contract that will keep him at the club until 2019, manager Alan Pardew has said....

headline.main: Dwight Gayle Agrees New Contract With Crystal Palace
headline.print_headline: Dwight Gayle Agrees New Contract With Crystal Palace

lead_paragraph: Crystal Palace striker Dwight Gayle has agreed a new contract that will keep him at the club until 2019, manager Alan Pardew has said.
